subject: help with mei on fuchi
msgSnippet: Jim & Alan and all, Can you guys please take a look at the fuchi/kashira I have posted in Mike s photo album.  I am struggling with the mei.  It is a very
messageBody:
Jim & Alan and all,
Can you guys please take a look at the fuchi/kashira I have posted in
"Mike's" photo album. I am struggling with the mei. It is a very fine set
with a Oni theme, it looks like a diety is grapping the oni on the kashira.
Any help with the mei or the theme would be greatly appreciated. Here is
the link:

http://ph.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/photos/browse/e3cc

or please look in Mike's photo album in the Nihonto Study group.
Thanks, Mike
